title: Havent received my level up rewards for level 28
body:
I see this is an issue many are experiencing and was wondering if there are any updates as to when we should see our capsules/BE

Edit: 3 hours since level up and a ticket later and unfortunately still nothing? any updates anyone?

replies.body: This account did get it's level 28 capsule. Looks like you already opened it, and it had 725 BE. Went ahead and double checked, and you've already been able to get your level 29 capsule as well which had Olaf and Amumu!

that is impossible because currently I am level 28 but I did receive olaf and amumu for 27 but just hit lvl 28 as of 5pm today and received nothing.

Edit: any chance you spelled my name wrong or something bc I am 100% certain I received nothing after I hit it and didnt even get a pop up that I leveled up. 

Edit 2: if you hover over my name on here it even says I am level 28! Also yesterday I had 4501 BE and leveled up today and still have that amount.
Looks like someone got that added in your ticket anyways! Double rewards, sweet XD
